cms.query.QueryText: SELECT COM_ShoppingCartSKU.ShoppingCartID, COM_ShoppingCartSKU.SKUUnits, COM_SKU.* FROM COM_ShoppingCart INNER JOIN COM_ShoppingCartSKU ON COM_ShoppingCart.ShoppingCartID = COM_ShoppingCartSKU.ShoppingCartID INNER JOIN COM_SKU ON COM_ShoppingCartSKU.SKUID = COM_SKU.SKUID WHERE COM_ShoppingCart.ShoppingCartUserID = @ShoppingCartUserID ORDER BY COM_ShoppingCart.ShoppingCartLastUpdate DESC
